info.title: smapOne
info.description: Use this connector to retrieve data regarding your smaps from the smapOne plattform, update datasources or create tasks for your users.

get.description: This operation returns information about the current user. For example users e-mail and subscriptionId.

get.summary: Get statistics about user and subscription
get.description: This operation gives you statistics about your subscription like the data count.
Returns a list of datasources available in your subscription. The returned entities can be used to query for datasource versions using a given dataSourceId.
Returns the details to a given Datasource.
Returns the values of a specific datasource version.

put.description: Update a datasource. The columns must be equal. That means that the column-ids must match.

parameters.name: dataSourceVersion
parameters.description: The version number of the current datasource version (e.g. 1.0)

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: The list of key value pairs

get.description: Returns all smaps of your subscription. The returned entities can be used to query for available smap versions using a given smapId or to query for data records of a smap.

404.description: A given resource was not found.

get.summary: Get details for a specific smap
get.description: Get all the metadata for a specific smap

parameters.name: smapId
parameters.description: The smapId of a smap to be requested

get.summary: Get all data records for all versions of a smap
get.description: Returns all records to a given smapId. Data records of all smap versions are returned. Be aware that the results may not be mutually compatible because the data schema may have changed between smap version.

parameters.name: markAsExported
parameters.description: Mark all requested records as exported

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter records for their state: new, exported or incomplete (Task)

get.summary: Get the reports for all data records of all versions of a smap
get.description: Returns the reports for all record of a given smapId. Reports of all smap versions are returned.

parameters.name: markAsExported
parameters.description: Mark the data records of all requested reports as exported

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter records for their state: new, exported or incomplete (Task)

get.summary: Get all data records for smap version
get.description: Returns all records for a specific smap version using a given smapId. For all new records the export date will be updated automatically. You can use the state parameter to filter for new records.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The smap version in major (e.g. 1) or major.minor (e.g. 1.1) format

parameters.name: markAsExported
parameters.description: Mark all requested records as exported

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format (.json oder .xml), Default is Json

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: filter the records for state new, exported or incomplete

delete.summary: Delete data records of a smap version
delete.description: Deletes all data records to a given smap version. Be aware that you delete all of your records if you do no set the state filter!

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: filter the records for state new, exported or incomplete

post.summary: Create Task for a smap version
post.description: Create a task - a prefilled data record that can be assigned to a user

get.summary: Get the reports for all data records from a specific smap version
get.description: Returns the reports for all records of a specific smap version. For all new records the export date will be updated automatically. You can use the state parameter to filter for new records.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The smap version in major or major.minor format

parameters.name: markAsExported
parameters.description: Mark the data records of all requested reports as exported

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter the records for state new, exported or incomplete

get.summary: Get the report of a data record
get.description: Returns the report of a specific data record of a given smap version.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Pdf, Docx, Doc, Html, Xml, Txt (for testing purposes)

parameters.name: useDefault
parameters.description: If true a new template is generated and the uploaded report template will be ignored.

get.description: Returns a specific data record of a given smap version.

delete.description: Deletes a specific data record of the given smap version.

get.summary: Get all file meta data for data record
get.description: Returns the meta data for all files of this data record.
Returns a specific file for the given recordId of the given smap version.

put.description: Assign or remove a task from a user

put.summary: Update all datasources in a smap
put.description: Check all referenced datasources for an update. If there are newer minor versions of the referenced datasources the references were updated and a new version of this smap is published. If their are no updates available no publish will be executed and the latest version will be returned.

parameters.name: updateEditVersion
parameters.description: If the current designer version should be updated too

get.description: Returns als versions that belong to the given smapId. The returned entities can be used to query for data records to a given version. The Version 0.0 is the version currently edited, not jet published verrsion of a smap.
Get metadata for a specific version of a smap
Get the json schema for the data of this smap

accountIsActivated.description: Indicates if the account has been activated. If not, the user has not yet verified the account.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription id of the user

companyName.description: The company name registered for the subscription

email.description: The email address of the user

originalMail.description: If the current account was accessed using impersonation then this shows the email address of the original user.

roles.description: A list of roles that apply to the user

smapLimit.description: Maximum number of smaps that this user is allowed to publish. A value of null means unlimited.

publisher.description: A text describing the publisher to its users.

isInternal.description: Indicates that this account is internally used by smapOne.

userLimit.description: The maximum of users that the creator can create

publishedSmaps.description: Number of published smaps of this account

availableFeatures.description: A list of available features for this account

settings.description: Custom settings stored on this account. Will only be output if the "embed" parameter is set on the request.

culture.description: Currently selected culture for this account. Given as two digit culture code, e.g. "en".

createdDate.description: Date when the datasource was created

latestVersion.description: The latest version available for this datasource

createdDate.description: The date when this version of the data source was created

version.description: The version number of this data source version

dataSourceId.description: The id of the data source

name.description: The name of the data source.

AbstractDataSourceDefinition.description: The definition of this data source version

dataSourceId.description: The id of the data source
The id of the data source

type.description: The type of the data source

name.description: The name of the data source

createdDate.description: Date when the data source was created

latestVersion.description: The latest version available for this data source

usedInSmaps.description: smaps that use this data source

changeType.description: Indicates what kind of changes have been made to the smap compared to the last published version.

lastChanged.description: Date when that last change has been made to the smap

isUpToDate.description: Indicates that the smap has not been changed since it was last published

installationsCount.description: Number of installations of the smap

totalDataCount.description: Count of all data records for all versions of a smap

totalOpenTasksCount.description: Number of open tasks for this smap

tasksActivated.description: Indicates that the option to create tasks from data records is activated for this smap.

isCompanyTemplate.description: Indicates if this smap was made available as company template

logoId.description: Id for the logo of a smap

lastChanged.description: Date when this version was published. For version 0.0 (edit version) it shows when the last change was made to the smap.

lastRecordReceived.description: Date when last data record has been received for this version of a smap

dataCount.description: Number of data records for this smap version

smapVersionId.description: The id of this version of a smap

version.description: The version number of this version of a smap

DataRecordApi.description: REST API model for data records

recordType.description: Describes the type of the data record. It is either a task or a self-created data record.

subscriptionId.description: Identifier of the subscription which the data record and the according smap belongs to.

smapId.description: Identifier of a smap the data record belongs to.

smapVersionId.description: Identifier of a smap version the data record belongs to.

version.description: Human-readable smap version the data record belongs to.

tokenId.description: Identifier of a smap token with which the data record was created.

userId.description: Identifier of the user who created the data record

userEmail.description: Email address of the user who created the data record

userName.description: Name of the user who created the data record. Attention: When the data record was created via an anonymous license, this field has an unreadable unique identifier in it.

sendDate.description: Time stamp when the data record was completed by the user and queued for sending to the server in the smapOne App.

clientCreatedDate.description: Time stamp of when a data record was forwarded by the user and thus became a task.

receivedDate.description: Time stamp at which the data record was received by the server. This will be set when the record itself has been transferred to the server, but the associated files might not have yet. This time stamp will be later than sendDate but before completedDate.

completedDate.description: Time stamp at which the completed data record itself and all referenced files were completely transferred to and received by the server.

deletedDate.description: Time stamp at which the data record was deleted

lastExportDate.description: Time stamp when the data record was exported the last time

toCompleteOn.description: The date on which the data record is to be published

title.description: Name of the task or data record.

data.description: The collected data from the smap. A list of key value pairs where the key is the id of each module of a smap and the value is the actual data from that module.

title.description: Name der Aufgade oder des Datensatzes kann via formel generiert sein

comment.description: Comment from the creator of the task

type.description: The type of the data source

title.description: A title describing the data source

costCenter.description: Cost Center of the managed subscription

email.description: Email address of the Creator (subscription owner)

createdDate.description: Date when this subscription was created

lastLoginTime.description: Date of the last login to the subscription

publisher.description: The publisher name for the subscription

smapCount.description: Number of smaps of the subscription

installationCount.description: Number of active installations for all smaps of the subscription

dataCount.description: Number of all data records for all smaps of the subscription

userCount.description: Number of smap users of the subscription

apiToken.description: REST API Token of the subscription
